In England, in the seven days to 06 July, there were 169,723 new confirmed cases (301.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 June, there were 117,237 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 45% (52,486 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 July is 4,450,372 (7,906.6 cases per 100,000 population).
